name: articles-by-lat-lon-without-images
title: Articles by lat/lon without Images API
description: Get articles by lat/lon without good images or Wikidata items without any image.
keywords: tools, discoverability, commons, images, maps, api, php, wikidata
author: Abbe98

name: ajapaik2commons
title: Ajapaik2commons
description: Import rephotographs from Ajapaik.ee to Commons.
keywords: tools, import, commons, ajapaik, api, javascript
author: Abbe98

name: wmf-sitematrix
title: wmf-sitematrix
description: Serves static lists of WMF Mediawikis, updated automatically every 15 days.
author: Abbe98

name: warped-to-iframe
title: Warped Maps to IFrames
description: Service for embedding warped maps externally.
author: Abbe98

name: churches
title: Churches API
description: API for churches in Sweden, currently combaining Wikidata, Commons, Wikipedia, Kulturarvsdata, etc.
author: Abbe98

name: human-readable-kulturarvsdata
title: Human Readable Kulturarvsdata
description: Userscript for Wikidata to make all Kulturarvsdata URIs(P1260) link to their human readable source.
author: Abbe98

name: taxon-info
title: Taxon-Info
description: Display taxon/specie information from Wikidata ID(made for qr-codes in botanical gardens) Proof of concept made for WMNO.
author: Abbe98

name: kyrksok-se
title: Kyrksök.se
description: Kyrksök.se is a external site/directory for browsing churches in Sweden, linking together Commons, Wikipedia, Wikidata and other datasets.
keywords: tools, wikidata, commons, wikipedia, heritage, kulturarvsdata
author: Abbe98

name: commons-warper-viewer
title: Commons Warper Viewer
description: Userscript for displaying georefrenced maps directly on Wikimedia Commons.
author: Abbe98

name: maps-userscript-boilerplate
title: Maps Userscript Boilerplate
description: Boilerplate for writing Commons UserScripts that takes advantage from the Warper API.
author: Abbe98

name: wikidata-osm-link
title: Wikidata to OpenStreetMap Link
description: This userscript adds a link to OpenStreetMap from a item page whenever a Wikidata item is referenced in the OSM database.
author: Abbe98
